Reviews.Content: rho hotel located central amsterdam hotel situated stones throw dam square actually famous dam square monument window booked single hotel website arrived 4 hours 2pm check ready bonus staff clean comfortable decent shower bathroom flat screen fridge mini bar free easy safe foyer impressive spacious drinks snack vending machine heineken water hot drinks machine coffees etc situated bar located left main check desk drink actually weekend plenty choose soon walk outside hotel breakfast buffet fine bacon scrambled eggs usual continental choices pick fresh juices tea coffee available impressive amsterdam standards summary hesitate stay rho location biggest plus hotel 3 star experience fair assessment city based hotel europe stayed 4 5 star hotels amsterdam cant fault rho slightly dated corridor little noise street below personally wouldnt stop staying
